description:
It’s time for the semifinals! Kawachi is up against scientific genius Shigeru Kanmuri. Kawachi is feeling confident, but something seems to be wrong with his dough…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuma no Junkesshou!! Yukino no Hiretsu na Wana!
Demi-finale cauchemardesque ! Le piège infâme de Yukino !
ฝันร้ายรอบชิงชนะเลิศ และแผนสกปรกของยูกิโนะ
悪夢の準決勝!! 雪乃の卑劣な罠!
